isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS INTERNATIONAL PS125-9A, PS140-9A, PSO125-9A, PSO140-9A AND PSO150-9A - CLEAN AND INSPECT

svcsubsecinfo.para: Prior to reassembly, clean all parts thoroughly with a petroleum based solvent, and inspect thoroughly for wear or damage. Parts damaged from previous service should be replaced to insure maximum rebuild life.

warning.para: Read and understand the solvent manufacturer's safety precautions to prevent personal injury or transmission damage.
Do not use gasoline to clean parts. Gasoline can explode causing serious physical injury.

caution.para: Do not use water or steam to clean internal components. Doing so could cause corrosion to these components.

svcsubsecinfo.para: Suggested inspection procedures include the following:

svcproc.title: CLUTCH COLLARS
svcproc.para: Both the internal and external teeth must have sharp edges. Rounded corners or excessive chipping will cause gear jumping. Also, examine fork slots for wear.
